document:
This distribution of Smyle contains snippets of 3rd party code (some in source, some in binary form). That code is covered under the following licenses:
FileDescriptionLicenseHomepage
etc/jmcop_src_raw.jar jMCOP (recent CVS) LGPL http://projects.sf.net/jmcop
lib/ant.jar, lib/ant_optional.jar Jakarta Ant 1.3, modified Apache Software License http://jakarta.apache.org/ant
lib/ant_jaxp.jar, lib/ant_parser.jar Java API for XML Processing The software in the packages javax.xml.parsers and javax.xml.transform is covered by the JAXP Reference Implementation License. The software under the package hierarchies beginning with org.w3c.dom is covered by the W3C Software License. All of the remaining software in this distribution is covered by the Apache Software License. http://java.sun.com/xml/xml_jaxp.html
lib/ant_gjc.jar The GJ Compiler Custom license http://www.research.avayalabs.com/user/wadler/pizza/gj/
lib/ant_gjdoc.jar gjdoc (javadoc replacement for GJ), slightly modified Custom license http://www.owlnet.rice.edu/~bogart/gjdocpage.html
lib/junit37.jar JUnit 3.7 Custom license http://www.junit.org
lib/gi09.jar The Generic Interpreter GPL http://www.csupomona.edu/~carich/gi/
src/gnu/* GNU UTF8 encoder/decoder GPL http://www.classpath.org/
src/com/go/* Trove Tea Software License http://opensource.go.com/
